title: National Mental Health Awareness Month, 2025
summary:
The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump designating May 2025 as National Mental Health Awareness Month. It emphasizes the importance of recognizing and addressing mental health challenges affecting millions of Americans. The Administration is committed to improving mental health care, particularly for veterans, and encourages open dialogue and compassion in dealing with mental health issues.

Key initiatives mentioned include the Make America Healthy Again Commission, which aims to tackle the root causes of health crises, enhance access to nutritious food, and expand treatment options. The proclamation calls upon all Americans to support those suffering from mental illnesses and to engage in activities that raise awareness and promote innovative approaches to prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.

The overarching message is one of unity and support, urging individuals to seek help and work together towards a healthier future for the nation.
